texto.p1: Leden van de Angolese Gemeenschap in Nederland zijn bij elkaar gekomen om dit project op te zetten en uit te voeren.
texto.p2: Onze missie is om slachtoffers van extreem droogte in Cuando Cubango, Angola, te ontlasten.
texto.p3: Door middel van deze campagne willen we kleding en voedsel doneren voor het bestrijden van dringend nood aan basislevensmiddelen.

texto.p1: Members of the Angolan Community in the Netherlands have come together to set up and implement this project.
texto.p2: Our mission is to relieve victims of extreme drought in Cuando Cubango, Angola.
texto.p3: Through this campaign, we want to donate clothing and food to combat the urgent need for basic foodstuffs.
texto.p4: We also want to bring the local government in Cuando Cubango into contact with Dutch experts in the field of water issues and agriculture.

texto.p1: Membros da Comunidade Angolana na Holanda juntaram-se para criar e implementar este projecto.
texto.p2: A nossa missão é socorrer as vítimas da seca extrema no Cuando Cubango, Angola.
texto.p3: Com esta campanha, queremos doar roupas e alimentos para combater a necessidade urgente de alimentos básicos.
texto.p4: Queremos também colocar o governo local do Cuando Cubango em contacto com especialistas holandeses na área da água e agricultura.
